title: doc/effective_go: remove goroutine restriction from init section
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Look at doc/effective_go.html  doc/effective_go.tmpl
2. Look at the section on "The init function"
3. It says that goroutines are not executed during init

What is the expected output?
I expect that the doc does one of the following:
- not mention anything about goroutines, OR
- make clear that goroutines can be executed during init.

What do you see instead?
It says that a restriction of init function is that 
goroutines are not executed during init

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?


Which operating system are you using?


Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
5c664f190e4e+ tip

Please provide any additional information below.

I would do a CL but not sure how you want to spin it.
